name: cronevibes
description: ## Built With Used the [Start Bootstrap - Grayscale](https://startbootstrap.com/template-overviews/grayscale/) template for easy deployment and so I can focus on the content. [Grayscale](http://startbootstrap.com/template-overviews/grayscale/) is a multipurpose, one page HTML theme for [Bootstrap](http://getbootstrap.com/) created by [Start Bootstrap](http://startbootstrap.com/).
